name: coral-rtsp-detector
tagline: Coral Edge TPU RTSP detector (Coral Dev Board/USB)
primaryHw: Coral Dev Board / USB Accelerator (arm64/amd64 host)
whatItDoes: Runs TFLite Edge TPU detection and serves annotated RTSP stream.
whyItSavesTime: Bypasses libedgetpu/tflite install pains; ready RTSP overlay and health endpoints.
